definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
a speech/to speak/to talk/to address/CL:個|个[ge4]
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to pay particular attention to/carefully selected for quality/tastefully chosen
to stress/to emphasize/particular about sth/to strive for
to give a lecture/to lecture on

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授講的話原原本本紀錄下來然後記住。

sentences.english: I couldn't remember a story to tell the children. , so I .
sentences.chinese: 我想不起來故事給孩子們講，所以，我編了一個。

sentences.english: On the one hand, I can see that this is a pretty cool gadget.
sentences.chinese: 從這方面講，我認爲它是一個相當出色的小把戲。

sentences.english: Speak frankly, I pray you, be it for life or death.
sentences.chinese: 我請你坦率地講出來，不管我是該活還是該死。

sentences.english: When SSH jokes, he will turn hellos head and look for KTHsreaction.
sentences.chinese: 宋承憲講嘲笑話的時候回頭不雅察泰熙反映。

sentences.english: It is quite baffling why he should have made such remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他爲什麼講這番話，真叫人莫名其妙。

sentences.english: I will expand on this in a minute.
She would rather tell the truth than lie.
sentences.chinese: 她寧願講實話而不願說謊。

sentences.english: Now , I will tell you a story about the little hero Yulai .
sentences.chinese: 現在，我就給你們講抗日小英雄雨來的故事。

sentences.english: We don’t want to ding them with fines.
sentences.chinese: 我們並不想反覆地跟他們講罰款。

sentences.english: Today we call these factors genes.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們講這些遺傳因子稱爲基因。

sentences.english: At which point I understood that the whole thing had been a joke.
sentences.chinese: 我明白無論從那個角度講，整個事情都是一個玩笑。

sentences.english: I couldn't speak Chinese, but I showed in mime that I wanted a drink.
sentences.chinese: 我不會講漢語，但我作摹擬動作表示要一杯飲料。

sentences.english: Thet flocked round Gavroche. But he had no time to tell anything.
sentences.chinese: 但他沒有時間講什麼話。

sentences.english: Next best thing to tell the truth, ' muttered Captain Smollett. 'Load his gun, Hawkins.
sentences.chinese: “講實話也算不錯，”斯莫列特船長咕噥道。

sentences.english: When SSH jokes, he will turn his head and look for KTHsreaction.
sentences.chinese: 宋承憲講冷笑話的時間回頭視察泰熙反映。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to press charges/to file a complaint
